required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: The Role of Endogenous GLP-1 (Glycolipoprotein) in Regulating Glucose Stimulated Brain Activity
clinical_study.official_title: The Role of Endogenous GLP-1 in Regulating Glucose Stimulated Brain Activity

brief_summary.textblock: Our objective is to investigate neuro-anatomical correlates of the regulation of energy intake by means of functional MRI. Administration of glucose with and without lactisole and exendin as well as fructose is followed by functional brain MRI, and findings are correlated with serum GLP-1 levels as an endogenous satiety signal in humans.

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Randomized, Intervention Model: Crossover Assignment, Masking: Double Blind (Subject, Investigator), Primary Purpose: Prevention

primary_outcome.measure: Functional magnetic resonance imaging (fMRI) in healthy volunteers while they performed a working memory task: changes in cerebral blood flow and blood hormones from baseline to treatment
primary_outcome.time_frame: changes from baseline to one hour after treatment
primary_outcome.description: Whole brain analysis with a cluster-level threshold was followed by an a priori defined region of interest analysis of the dorsolateral prefrontal cortex including a cluster-level threshold and family-wise error adjustment for multiple comparisons.

arm_group.description: Single intragastric instillation of 300ml tap water via nasogastric tube
Single intragastric instillation of 75g Glucose in 300ml tap water via nasogastric tube
Single intragastric instillation of 75g Glucose in 300ml tap water with 450ppm lactisole
Single intragastric instillation of 25g Fructose in 300ml tap water via nasogastric tube
Single intragastric instillation of 75g glucose in 300ml tap water with 600pmol/kg/min exendin 9-39
Single intragastric instillation of 300ml tap water with 450ppm lactisole

intervention.intervention_name: Single intragastric instillation of 75g Glucose in 300ml tap water via nasogastric tube
Single intragastric instillation of 75g Glucose in 300ml tap water with 450ppm lactisole
75g glucose in 300ml tap water with 600pmol/kg/min exendin 9-39

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- right-handed healthy males, no drugs, non-smoking
Exclusion Criteria:
- drug abuse, smoker, left-handed, claustrophobia
